original_question: An image that is double the size of the object would have what?
diverse_qns: If an image is twice the size of its object, what would it have?
How would you describe an image that is twice the size of its object?
Could you tell me what an image that is double the size of its object would possess?
What characteristics might an image have if it is two times bigger than the original object?
Would you be able to tell me what an image that is twice as big as the object consists of?
Can you explain what an image, that is double in size as compared to the object, has?
Please describe the qualities an image would have if it is twice the size of its object?
What would an image doubled in size from the actual object entail?
What can you tell me about an image which is twice as large as the real object?
If the image is doubled in size compared to the object, what features would it display?
pred_ans: An image that is double the size of the object would have twice the number of pixels.
pred_ans_conf_MCQ: An image that is double the size of the object would have twice the amount of pixels
pred_ans_conf_NL_MCQ: An image that is double the size of the object would have twice the number of pixels
pred_ans_conf_OE: An image that is double the size of the object would have twice the amount of pixels.
pred_diverse_ans: It would have a resolution of 72 dpi.
An image that is twice the size of its object is called an enlarged image.
Such an image would be called a "magnified" or "enlarged" image.
The image might have a larger size and a more prominent appearance.
No, it is not possible to determine the contents of an image that is twice as big as the object it represents.
An image that is double in size as compared to the object has a resolution of 72 dpi.
The image would have a resolution of 200% or 2:1 aspect ratio.
An image doubled in size from the actual object would appear larger than the actual object in the image.
The image is a magnification of the real object.
The image would display twice the size of the object.
